title: Vortexian
summaries: The Vortexian is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist enemy spawned by the Vortex Pillar during the Lunar Events. Their death opens a portal that shoots lightning bolts similar to one of the attacks of the Lunatic Cultist. They are powerful in packs, and can potentially start an overwhelming lightning chain reaction if not dealt with properly.

statistics.Damage: 90/180/270
statistics.Max Life: 700/1400/2100
statistics.KB Resist: 40%/46%/52%
statistics.Banner: [img:Vortexian Banner]Vortexian Banner
